channel.title: Art for Charity on Seraphine Arts
channel.description: Recent content in Art for Charity on Seraphine Arts

item.title: Dawn - 2022
item.description: Inspired by the Lunar New Year of the Tiger 2022, I created the illustration “DAWN” as the first motif of the art for charity cooperation with the LO-ANH Foundation (LOAN Stiftung). “DAWN” will be exclusively available throughout the Lunar Year of the Tiger, with all funds being transferred to the LO-ANH Foundation (LOAN Stiftung) every quarter. Update February 2022: Thanks to your amazing support we were able to raise 340â‚¬ and make our first donation.
